alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Grundy; Howard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 02 at 6:37AM CDT until August 03 at 10:24PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of central Missouri, north central Missouri and northeast Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Howard. In north central Missouri, Chariton, Grundy, Linn MO, Macon, Mercer, Putnam, Randolph and Sullivan. In northeast Missouri, Adair. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 637 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Between 4 and 10 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Moberly, Macon, Milan, Huntsville, La Plata, Princeton, Bevier, Green City, Higbee, Bucklin, Atlanta, Mercer, Clark, Callao, Cairo, Greencastle, Browning, Galt, New Cambria and Purdin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
